overview: Grind Bar is the type of establishment mothers warn their sons about. Despite its location off the beaten path, the dive bar has been drawing in young men from nearby towns for years. Their success stems from the hot young bartenders on staff. Grind Bar developed a reputation for hiring “wild mustangs”: women with personalities and looks that cannot be tamed.  Run by the local biker gang, the bar’s owners have been known to clash with its innocent young patrons. Named for the sexy grind dance the bartenders perform nightly on top of the bar, Grind Bar is a hot bed of lust with an element of danger that’s as intoxicating as the drinks in the glasses.
title: Welcome to Grind Bar
